title: Science Education Design Workshop: Learning Activity Design Decisions and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Elementary Science Curricula and Project-Based Learning (PBL) Experience
context.additional_context: Workshop-based discussions for science education design in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) settings. Exploring formative assessment-centered learning activities and evaluation methods

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least two strategies for effectively integrating learning theories and educational resources when designing learning activities.
Learners can design and apply at least three formative assessment strategies based on learner responses in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) environment.
Learners can derive improvements for science education design through peer feedback sharing.

resources: Online collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
